**🔥 Severity/Priority**  
Please choose one:

- ⬜️ Low — Minor UI issue that doesn't block features
- ⬜️ Medium — Noticeable issue that requires attention
- ⬜️ High — Breaks a major feature
- ⬜️ Critical — Makes the app or site unusable

---

3. Scroll down to `...`
4. See the error `...`
